body.name: Fosmon Mini Bluetooth Keyboard (QWERTY Keypad), Wireless Portable with Touchpad, Compatible with Apple TV, Amazon Fire Stick, PS4, PS4 Pro, PS5, HTPC/IPTV, VR Glasses, Smartphones
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 44 mins
features: [COMPACT & PORTABLE QWERTY KEYBOARD WITH TOUCHPAD] Innovative and compact QWERTY keyboard with touchpad that provides comfort combined with the freedom of wireless connectivity. Connect to all of your favorite devices with this wireless keyboard. This controller gives you everything you need right in the palm of your hand. Navigate the cursor easily with your thumb without having to touch your screen, mouse or keyboard. Excellent for browsing, searching or streaming on a smart TV. Gamers can use

[BLUETOOTH COMPATIBILITY] This keyboard connects to a multitude of devices through Bluetooth such as: Apple TV, Amazon Fire Stick, Google TV, Playstation PS4, HTPC/IPTVVR Glasses (Virtual Reality Headset Box) smartphones (iOS/Android/Windows), notebooks, laptops (Windows/Mac OS X v10.7 Lion and above) and more. With a working range of approx. 33ft/10m, easily connect and control Bluetooth devices with this wireless keyboard. (Not Compatible with Xbox series)

[LONG LASTING RECHARGEABLE BATTERY] Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery with up to 10 days of continuous working time and up to 50 days of standby time. The LED indicators notify when the battery is low and when it is fully charged. Charging via the included USB cable is simple and easy.
[BACKLIT KEYBOARD] The convenient backlit keyboard is perfect for using in a dark environment.
[LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY] We cannot guarantee compatibility with all smart T.V.s. Please check the Bluetooth capability of your T.V. before purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If Size and Functionality is your goal, buy this Mini BT Keyboard!
reviews.reviewText: So overall I have a bad habit of buying multiple items of the same category, due to me being conflicted about said items different features. Pertaining to the “FOSMON Mini BT Keyboard”, I believe that I have finally discovered the “perfect” Mini BT Keyboard (at least for me). Unlike some of the others I have purchased, this one feels the most “balanced” as well as offers the best QWERTY and multimedia key layout.One major problem that was common on the multiple other Mini BT Keyboards I have purchased was the Touchpad. It honestly felt like all the others simply added the Touchpad in order to compete with the other brands, but its functionality was to just visually look like their competition. Well this is not the case with the “FOSMON Mini BT Keyboard”. To my complete surprise the touchpad not only works fantastically, the Left & Right click button layout was actually thought out and designed with “User Comfort” at the forefront.Pairing this mini keyboard with any BT device is a breeze, and it instantly connects everytime it is switched on. I personally use mine for connecting to my iPad Pro 12.9”, TCL 55” OLED 4K TV, and my Steam Deck. In my gaming room my recliner is roughly 5-6 feet from my TCL TV, and connection range is not an issue whatsoever. I actually stood against the back wall in my game room which is roughly 15 feet from the TV, and once again the range was not an issue at all. Overall the snappy connection, the perfectly thought out key layout, and the touchpad functionality alone was enough for this Mini BT Keyboard to surpass all the others easily, but some other functions place cherries on the top. To give you an example of how compact this keyboard actually is I’ve attached a photo with it side by side with my Apple Pencil Gen 2, and they are both nearly the exact same thickness which is super thin, but not TOO thin.I have been using this keyboard for 2-3 hours daily for nearly a week, and the battery is still not dead yet! All of all the other models I have purchased seemed to die after 4-5 hours of use, so this keyboard surpasses the others by an extreme longshot. Overall I absolutely love this Mini BT Keyboard, and have another one in my Amazon cart just so I have a backup in the event Amazon quits selling them for some strange reason. You will not be disappointed with this purchase, so click “Add to Cart / Buy Now” and rest easy knowing your money has been well spent!- Pros: • The Mini-ness is IMO the perfect size Mini. Any larger or Smaller would detract from its great balance. • The keys are very solid and have a nice “click” to them. You can physically feel each click perfectly. • Battery life is supurb, and leagues above any other Mini BT Keyboard I have purchased (10+) • I am a function over form guy without a doubt, but if it matters to you, this keyboard looks sharp! • The touchpad is the closest to feeling like a full size touchpad I’ve discovered, and it isn’t even close. • Tons of “Multimedia” keys that expand the functionality with multiple devices exponentially. • Solid build that doesnt feel cheaply made. At this price point it is incredible that it feels this nice.- Cons: • All in all I truly can not list any “Glaring” cons, but I will list some things that could be a little better. • Not having backlit keys doesn’t detract from how much I love this keyboard, but they would be nice. • A little bit larger touchpad would be nice but would affect the perfect size IMO, so no issue honestly. • Using a Micro-USB to charge is very outdated, and charging using a USB-C would of been nice to have. • Honestly nothing else to list. I love it, and I think you will as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a great small keyboard, size of smart phone.
reviews.reviewText: I like how this keyboard is small, but actually very easy and natural to use. It's about the size of a larger smart phone, but extremely light weight. I use it with my PC which has a TV as one monitor. I can sit across the room and control it like a regular keyboard would. It does not come with a Bluetooth chip dongle, so you will have to have a Bluetooth receiver in your PC already if you use it in this way. The track pad works surprisingly well. It charges with a USB c plug. There is a switch to turn off power so you can save it's battery while not in use. It has volume controls and pause/play buttons, but also, most movies will pause by hitting the space bar, but now I can do that from the couch cause it's a mini keyboard! It has a button to toggle it's key lights, so you can use it in the dark. Super happy with this freakin thing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works perfectly as a handheld keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I fixed up my old pc to be a media center in the family room and this works perfectly for navigating the menu and browsing the internet. the battery holds very well and has a sleep mode that it goes into after about a minute of inactivity and wakes up about a second after pressing a key or jostling the track pad. the track pad is fairly precise for the size and requires a more gentle touch to work proper so don't press down when using, just glide your finger on it. the back lighting is sufficient for when the lights are off and its easy to turn off to conserve energy. I've had zero problem with connectivity since I paired it which was a breeze. the quality is there which is why I went for this one rather than the cheaper ones which all seem to have some kind of issues either with battery life, connectivity or something else. I wouldn't say this should be used for gaming because its far too small for conventional pc gaming but it fits fine in my hands and is ergonomic, perfectly fit to be a remote controller while away from a desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very middle of the road poor overall quality with a good layout
reviews.reviewText: Okay first the good. The trackpad is on the right which is great for right had folks and that is where I like it as well. The Left/Right click button are on the shoulders where one would expect to find them allowing your right thumb to remain constantly on the track pad while you use your left hand to click.Now the bad. Trackpad is a little too small and inaccurate. Bluetooth connectivity is spotty, I have a lot of wireless devices so it does have interference, but I have other Bluetooth devices that do not balk so this one is not as good as it could be. Even though the left/right mouse click buttons are on the shoulders they are not comfortable and should be closer to center instead of on the edge shoulders. I would prefer the device to also be bigger as well so it's too small for my tastes. Your mileage may vary. But this is definitely not for people that need/like bigger buttons.The keyboard is okay... seems low quality but it does have a backlight and is easy to see during day or night. The LED indicators are too bright... especially the blue ones... these indicators may well be bright and focused enough to cause actual eye damage if stared at too long or over time but someone with a tool to analyze light wave frequency needs to confirm. stupid bright led lights really need to be addressed... it is bright enough to light up the ceiling in blue when the lights are out.Over all 3 out of 5 it gets the job done but not very well.

reviews.reviewTitle: muy burna relacion de calidad y precio
reviews.reviewText: muy burna relacion de calidad y precio, y super comodo

reviews.reviewTitle: Depends what you want to do with it.
reviews.reviewText: I got this because after like 10 years of smartphone touch keyboards i'm still making tons of typos and sometimes I want to write something lengthy and use an actual tactile keyboard. I also wanted one that could fit in my pocket, the Logitec ones are great but not as portable. This one seemed like exactly the thing i wanted but unfortunately the touchpad makes it kind of akward and hard to reach the keys for the right hand, and not very good for longer writing sessions. Also I found the buttons are not pronounced enough to sort of navigate via sliding your fingers over them, I find myself looking down a lot while typing. But, i'm sure if I used it more it would become less of a problem.Works well. Turn the back lights on and off. You can use a mouse pointer on smart phone, that's kind of cool for some stuff. Copy and pasting much easier. All the good stuff you get from a bluetooth keyboard just more portable.There aren't very many choices in these things, which is too bad. I would have chosen one without a touch pad but I wouldn't find any that didn't look kinda cheap.
Tasten sind zwar klein, aber habe mit Hand größe 10,5 keine Probleme im zwei Daumen modus zu tippen. Das touchpad funktioniert sehr gut. Ausprobiert an Laptop, Galaxy s22 & s8 Ultra.

Hemos recibido el producto. Antes teníamos uno similar y al romperse, hicimos el cambio.hay una cosa que no encontramos, es el botón de Stop. Por el resto, es cuestión de acostumbrarnos a las diferencias.Pequeño, ergonómico.
Easy to write on youtube for example
